author: {'steamid': '76561197971140034', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1701851399}
review:
Garbage interface, zero players, and absolutely no maps included. Failed to install the base maps on repeated installs, meaning I can't even start a game with my friends.
Finding maps to download means going to an arbitrary webpage that isn't listed or referenced anywhere, as there's no logical means of finding maps within the game's dreadful UI.

No wonder this game is dead.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038133487', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 4968, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4968, 'last_played': 1701301310}
review: I was lucky enough to play this game at it's peak and came across it in my steam after 9 years away, it's still so good but there's not many players. It is a game begging to be made free to play. There's nothing else like the 3v3 elite game mode (the parkour game mode is fantastic as well thanks to some very unique movement mechanics) and I would be right back into it if we could get the matchmaking servers populated again.  It was a criminally underrated game on release and it's so sad to see one my favourite multiplayer games ever turned into a ghost town.

Fast FPS de fou!

author: {'steamid': '76561198878962569', 'num_games_owned': 340, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 48357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1915, 'playtime_at_review': 8985, 'last_played': 1710878190}
review:
Not gonna lie, but if Nadeo wants, they create a masterpiece.

This game is clearly one of them, and I'm asking you... Not even asking, but saying that you must buy the game!

It's literally something. It's a parkour, ctf game, a race and a runner!
Due to the big number of community gamemodes, this game is a place to play with friends.

Even with a small amount of players, the servers are still active, and to make it more active I'm doing anything what I can, and even stream the game.

The community is nice and friendly, even if there is ~100 players daily.

Really enjoyed the game.

Hello fellow gamers as Crash, Hype, Filifen and others from the Shootmania!

author: {'steamid': '76561198142303813', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 11253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11122, 'last_played': 1698609692}
review:
I used to play this game basically every day when it came out, and some of my best memories are connected to it. The gameplay is quite unique because of the weapons and various maps created by players themselves and there are always ways to improve. There are different types of modes you can play as well and each of them is different. Plus, the community is one of the best I've come across in any multiplayer game. 

However, as many others have already mentioned, it's been dead for a few years and very often there is nobody playing at all. If some people are online, it's usually those who've played it for a long time and just come back to it because of the nostalgia and/or community. That also means that these people are typically very good at the game, so a beginner probably won't have fun playing because they'll be dead as soon as they leave the spawn.

I'd recommend buying this game only if you have people to play it with. Otherwise you won't be able to enjoy it much, since usually you won't find any people there and if you occasionally do, they'll be much better at it after all those years.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982225800', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 318, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1679257037}
review:
Back when I played this during a free weekend in 2014, and again now in 2023, the online is still completely dead.

Some folks are making an effort at keeping the game alive by hosting the occasional event, but then the problem is that all the people attending are always European - which means I get a ping of 175ms while they get pings of 20-40ms on average. And add on top of that the fact those 10-15 people that still bother to play and who attend these planned events tend to be veterans, who will just smoke anyone new.

So if you're located in North America like I am, you're not going to have a good time. The only way I can see myself having fun in this game is if I bought a bunch of copies for my friends and hosted my own dedicated server. No thanks.

Overall it's a great game with limitless possibilities via the map editor and its skill-based gameplay, but sadly there's just nobody to play it against.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120545895', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 475324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2883, 'playtime_at_review': 375136, 'last_played': 1710879134}
review:
Pas grand chose à dire, le jeu est exceptionnellement bon...
Cependant y a plus personne, le jeu est mort. Mais pour ceux qui voudraient tester le jeu, il y a des serveurs Free to play appelés "Channel". À ce jour vous pourrez y trouver entre 10 et 20 joueurs (en soirée/fin d'aprém).
A ce stade, Nadeo devraient passer le jeu entièrement en free to play pour essayer de raviver la flamme, mais hélas les développeurs n'ont pas l'air du même avis, ou du moins ils s'en fichent. 
Donc dommage...

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198054696401', 'num_games_owned': 282, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 35155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16367, 'last_played': 1703297762}
review: Le jeu date et est très peu peuplé. Je ne suis pas un expert du côté PvP du jeu, il y a encore un petit peu de monde pour jouer mais je le recommande pour son mode "Obstacle". Des serveurs sont toujours hébergés, des dizaines de serveurs avec des milliers de maps. Ceux qui ne savent pas ce qu'est le mode "Obstacle", c'est des cartes faites par les joueurs, où il y a des CP comme dans Trackmania, tu dois naviguer de CP en CP grâce au saut, à l'arme qui permet plusieurs choses. C'est très skillé et très addictif, même si le jeu n'est pas très peuplé, vous trouverez toujours quelqu'un sur un serveur qui vous aidera à passer les obstacles et à vous apprendre le jeu. La communauté, même si petite, est très agréable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120936306', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 7942, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7942, 'last_played': 1527211895}
review:
[i]Только сейчас заметил, что так и не написал обзор[/i]
[i]Спасибо юбейсофт за удваивание прайса на игры, чтобы их покупало меньше людей или с большей злобой к вам (сам брал со скидкой рублей за 200-300 в далеком 2013-м)[/i]

[h1]Один из самых недооцененных арена-шутеров[/h1]

Если коротко, то задумки и механики у игры простые: бегай, прыгай (можно от стен), стреляй одним видом ракет (или другим оружием в специальных местах) - практически то, что и делается в большинстве других шутеров. Научиться просто, освоить до мастерства уже куда сложнее: например, ракеты летают медленно, и поэтому нужно уметь читать движения соперника и стрелять с просчетами.

Однако, как и в [b]Trackmania[/b], здесь есть возможность для творчества: конкретно здесь можно легко создавать свои карты, что уже может отличать от многих арена-шутеров, а также есть возможность с простым освоением монтировать видео из сохраняемых повторов. Более прошаренные уже давно наклепали кучу своих режимов игры (с учетом [b]очень низкого онлайна[/b], одним из самых популярных можно считать что-то вроде паркура/платформы/сёрфинга).

Сам я наиболее активно играл в 2014-2016 (а вообще застал обт 2013-го), тогда ещё было с кем играть и даже был выбор где. Сейчас, к сожалению, на серверах весьма и весьма пусто, а некоторые режимы либо забыты уже годами, либо, судя по новостям, происходят какие-то ноунеймные турниры (скучаю по Combo, в который последний раз как раз таки играл в 2014-м где-то).

Конкретно о покупке: честно, при всем уважении к игре, 800 рублей это уже многовато для пустых серверов, но можно загрузить демоверсию, где хоть и доступен всего один режим Elite (вроде в него тоже уже нечасто играют, но всё же), однако, если я не ошибаюсь, [b]также доступны Каналы, где в течение некоторого времени по расписанию можно бесплатно играть на определенном сервере - собственно, в таким местах больше всего людей.[/b]

review: ShootMania is aptly named, a solid FPS with simple yet unique gameplay mechanics that don't come off as gimmicky at all, as the historian claims that this game will be a forgotten memory in the history of Ubisoft and also within the Battle Royale games, although it will remain a dead game, however it will remain a pride for everyone who still plays it, I invite the people of PUBG, Fortnite and Free Fire to compare the value of these games which constitute social ills with the unparalleled value of this precious, precious game. I call upon those responsible in this game to put an end and work as hard as possible to restore life to this game.

review:
Решил вспомнить как залипал в бету в далеком 2012, поэтому купил по скидке. В итоге увидел пустые сервера (два сервака по 1-2 чел из всей европы). Пришлось вернуть деньги. Очень жаль.
Хорошая игра с оригинальной механикой. Чутка бы шлифануть графику, добавить пару плюшек и была бы топом в своем сегменте.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080468227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1577925505}
review:
На всегда в сердце. Начал играть еще когда она была бесплатная в бетта тестирование.   Потом вышел релиз, у меня просто не было денег ее купить.  Но мысли о ней были даже спустя года. 
Вот только она меня не ждала. Пустые сервера, нет многих крутых режимов. Играешь и индусами или турками. 
Эх. Как же было круто, в 2013 в нее играть и  как печально сейчас в нее заходить. 

 Как надоевшую игрушку забывает ребенок, так и юбисофт  забыл про свой проект. А потом   просто выкинул игру в мусорку прошлых игр. 

Тот случай, когда не отсутствия игроков и интереса к игре, а не желания заниматься поддержкой убило проект. 

Жалко, печально, грустно. 

Лайк на ВЕКА!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198189925545', 'num_games_owned': 485, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1611697686}
review:
PLAY IT

The best shooter I know and the first game apart from Minecraft that got me into gaming around 7 years ago. I bought it a second time on Steam just to be able to leave a review and animate people to play it. I really want it to survive!

Currently, if you're European, you should always find enough people to play, although there aren't many left sadly. Please do not miss out on this phenomenal experience - it is fast, tight, balanced and has a ton of community-content including classic modes like insta-gib, king of the hill, infection,... However, there are a ton of original ones as well, like obstacle, which really puts your precision to test and essentially creates a parkour-game-experience. All of these take place on a huge variety of maps made by either the devs or (mostly) the community.

It would be a shame to see this game die off completely, please support it - it's worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084794841', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 178944, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152692, 'last_played': 1687263506}
review:
Dead Game ? Peut être mais osef, au pîre y'a une version gratuite donc allez tester, ça vaut le coup.

Sinon pour une vrai review on va dire qu'il y a du monde sur tout les modes majeurs, certes les serv ne sont pas remplis mais on peut jouer sans difficulté.
Grande courbe de progression du "skill" par rapport au déplacements possible (wall jump, rocket wall jump, triwall, corner jump, flicks, dash wj, etc etc ...) pour le mode obstacle entre autre (qui vaut vraiment le coup, mais vraiment pour de vrai ... vraiment), et les différentes tactiques à adopter pour remporter la victoire en Elite, Battle ou SpeedBall.

La commu est présente en soutient pour vous aider a progresser rapidement, serveur discord pour certains mode de jeu afin d'avoir connaissance des événements organisé par la commu.

Il y a également un éditeur de maps pour les modes de jeu que vous souhaitez afin de jouer vos créations avec tout le monde et avoir de potentiels feedbacks. Skin custom, horn (klaxon ? ça peut paraître bizarre mais il y en a bien un) custom de 10 secondes pour casser les oreilles des gars du serv :D et éditeur de pseudo ingame relativement bien fournit. je passe mon tour pour l'éditeur de replay, si presque personne l'utilise réellement, c'est qu'il y a une raison ...

Donc si tout ça vous intéresse, testez la version gratuite, vous pourrez jouer à la plupart des mode en aillant accès au "channel" un serveur qui propose les modes majeur en rotation a chaque heure (planning dispo ingame et sur le site maniaplanet). Au moins le temps que le jeu soi en promo a moins de 10€

author: {'steamid': '76561198079281243', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 3805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3603, 'last_played': 1673814186}
review:
Can't believe I haven't written a review for this hidden gem yet!
This game is amazing! Not the shooting part of it though, the parkour part of it!

Well for me at least. I believe this is probably the epitome of what good parkour is in a video game!
Sadly the game is not very popular and the servers are a bit empty. BUT it doesn't really matter! As long as the servers are up you can go and do some parkour by yourself and try beating the record!

I highly recommend this game! Don't miss out on this if you like speed!

author: {'steamid': '76561198021122126', 'num_games_owned': 137, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1440873244}
review:
The idea is great, but it was poorly executed. 

Due to how ManiaPlanet (the engine ShootMania runs on) handles lag, there will be a severe amount of delay between an input and your player actually moving (for example, leftclicking takes forever before shooting a single blast). 

Since the only ShootMania servers are hosted in Europe, any players outside of that region will find it impossible to play due to high ping.

This issue was never addressed since the game was released 7 years ago.

Online is also kind of dead anyways, so not really worth buying until Nadeo/Ubisoft kicks up their marketing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038989319', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 10853, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10853, 'last_played': 1572747032}
review: One of the best shooters I have ever played. A fast arcade shooter with unique movement and wall-running. Oh the fun I had. Even my girlfriend loved it, who didn't really play PC games or shooters then - but Shootmania converted her. I would come home to find my brother glued to my PC, addicted. It gave you "that rush" - you know the one - that so few games give you. Also had an amazing royal rumble mode, way ahead of the RR craze. I literally weep from time to time when I remember this game, knowing it is unfortunately dead. At least I have two people to mourn with. R.I.P. Shootmania, you will be missed.

review:
I would like this game if it wasn't dead. No one plays it nor the Australian servers are brought back since Maniaplanet 4 update was release. Plus it is so laggy to the point it is not even playable. If ever someday, Maniaplanet 5 update will bring Shootmania back in a big way I hope.

However I did recommend you try the solo platform mode and invasion, those are playable and pretty fun.

This game is just so dead and forgotten by the developers. 

RIP Shootmania Storm....

author: {'steamid': '76561197979950442', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2574, 'last_played': 1550156070}
review:
Un gran juego en su momento, que degeneró por el abandono. Escasa comunidad y difícil de encontrar servidores con jugadores. Después de comprobarlo el año pasado (2018) he intentado volver a jugar, a lo que tras ejecutar el juego ya no accede directamente a mi cuenta de ManiaPlanet vinculada con Steam. Personalmente lo veo un error, ya que ahora mi clave de juego está asociada a una cuenta de ManiaPlanet de la cual no recuerdo ya ni el correo electrónico asociado. Si una compañía abandona un juego no puede pretender que sus escasos jugadores no vayan a hacer lo mismo.

En 2013 molaba. Hoy NO lo recomiendo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978131107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 212, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1549690536}
review:
As best as I can tell, it doesn't work and there are no players online. You are forced to download many large updates through their custom client at a very slow rate before this ever becomes apparent. This extended download process counts again your play time.

I spent about 20 minutes trying to join ANY server or custom server, but everything failed with an error about a missing file. A second, local server was not found in the local server browser, and all attempts at direct connection through the steam interface or their in-game interface failed. 

Thankfully I was able to initiate a refund before my grace period was up. There was apparently only a single other player online anyway so no big loss.

This title should be removed from the store.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003791564', 'num_games_owned': 548, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1549690510}
review:
Don't get this game.

The online multiplayer is dead, my friends can't connect to my local server, and there aren't any single-player options.

There is absolutely no reason to buy this.

It's really disappointing though; I was expecting great things from the people who made the fantastic Trackmania series. But, this game is too glitch-filled and abandoned to be played in its current state.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010369958', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 38, 'playtime_at_review': 327, 'last_played': 1710626205}
review:
Avant tout, je souhaite saluer Nadeo d'avoir développé le seul fps, à ma connaissance, dans lequel on élimine ses adversaires plutôt que de les "tuer" ! Ca peut paraître idiot mais je trouve que c'est un point essentiel de ce jeu qui nous plonge vraiment dans un univers esport à la fois moderne et futuriste. De notre apparition sur la map jusqu'à notre élimination ou notre victoire, tout est fait pour que l'on ait vraiment la sensation de prendre le contrôle d'un skin le temps d'un match dans l'arène, c'est très réussi et celà rend l'expérience de jeu unique.

Au niveau jouabilité, c'est un vrai bonheur! Rapide à prendre en main puisqu' en dehors de celles qui permettent de se déplacer, deux touches suffisent (tir et stamina). Différents types de déplacements permettent ensuite un jeu riche, aérien et plus technique: walljump, rocketjump, grappin, rampes glissantes, propulseurs, téléporteurs, surfaces au sol variées qui permettent d'accélérer ou ralentissent, qui empêchent de sauter, etc.. Pour éliminer ses adversaires, on dispose de rockets, railguns ou grenade selon les maps et le mode de jeu choisi.

Les graphismes et textures sont soignées bien que sobres et l'ambiance/immersion sont très réussies, détail appréciable, on peut choisir la qualité des textures en fonction de la configuration de son ordinateur avant de les télécharger/installer. Chacun peut aussi construire et partager ses propres maps, tous les outils sont fournis et intégrés à l'interface, une grande diversité de blocs/murs/objets permettent ainsi de varier durablement le jeu.

L'autre grand intérêt de ShootMania réside dans ses nombreux modes de jeu et dans la possibilité d'en créer soi-même, on y retrouve par exemple les modes Battle (capture de pôles par équipes), Elite (3 contre un en capture de pôle), Joust (un contre un), Royal (battleroyal), CTF (capture de drapeau), Obstacle (parcours d'agilité), et bien d'autres..

En ces temps de pay2win, de jeux tape-à-l'oeil inaboutis et onéreux, sombres et violents, je pense que ShootMania est un modèle de développement à plusieurs niveaux, il nous amène à un état d'esprit sportif et communautaire incomparable, dont beaucoup de développeurs/éditeurs devraient s'inspirer ! Malheureusement, il manque aujourd'hui cruellement de joueurs et n'obtient plus le succès qu'il mérite tant, je vous invite donc à le découvrir, un titre incontournable pour tout amateur de fps, un ovni du genre !

author: {'steamid': '76561198269041088', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1545583405}
review:
DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!!!

I have purchased this and installed it.
It forces you to download a piece of garbageware called "Mania Planet." I won't get into that, please do go to forums and discussions about Mania Planet and make a reasoned decision about whether or not you want to infect your PC with it..... If you love Trackmania as much as i did you may be willing to make the trade-off.......

This game Shootmania Storm simply doesn't work at all. When I start it it demands an update and after 30 minutes or so it tells me that it cannot install the game because it cannot find the titlepack and that the titlepack does not exist in the cloud. I tried entering my CD Key again and it told me that CD Key has already been used.

It takes HOURS to get ManiaPlanet running and updated........and then th game will say it doesn't exist.

Do what you wanna do, but if you are smart you will stay away from Shootmania and any other software that requires Mania Planet as if it were a lethal toxin. To call it garbage would be unfair, because garbage doesn't steal your money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021079558', 'num_games_owned': 2566, 'num_reviews': 265, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1405618422}
review:
A game that deserves more recognition I would say!

I have not played many hours in Steam, but the game outside of Steam I have hundreds, but I bought in Steam after.

Graphics: The graphics are decent enough to look and say "Yeah, they are good and I like them" Overal the optimisation is there and the game runs smooth as butter.

Audio: The audio itself fits the game well and it has some very good drawn in sounds that make it sound decent.

Controls: The simplest controls I have ever learnt and spent the time to play without a single problem on the learn curve.

The gameplay and every else:

The game is a fast pace shoot, hold and shoot for my power, bouncing shots, jumping, running etc style of game. I feel this game beats Quake and is on the same par as Unreal Tournament which also beats Quake.
I love the art style, characters and overal physical gameplay mechanics that draw you in.. This game does need more players and I feel not enough people are aware of this game who are in search off a fast paced gameplay.

Yes, I would 100% recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020597667', 'num_games_owned': 508, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1277, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1135, 'last_played': 1574537949}
review:

The concept is amazing, but there's no real appeal besides looking like an E-Sports game, which proves that it was just created for that purpose, without regarding the fact that you need to grow a fanbase before making it competable.
I wish I could recommend this game, but throwing 20 euros for a game without players gives you blue balls.
EDIT - Can you make it free 2 play ffs? Put this s*** on EPIC GAMES, make it free for a week and revive this...

author: {'steamid': '76561198234496568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5699, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2717, 'last_played': 1678746348}
review:
REVENEZ !!!
Ce jeu est super mais depuis le passage à ManiaPlanet 4, le nombre de joueurs a grandement diminué.
Parlons des différents modes :

-En mode Siège, une équipe attaque et l'autre défend des checkpoints et un pole que les attaquants doivent capturer, les attaquants sont armés du laser (un genre de sniper qui élimine l'adversaire en un coup) et les défenseurs de roquettes (l'arme par défaut du mode Battle). Les défenseurs rejouent à chaque pole capturé contrairement aux attaquants qui doivent attendre la prochaine manche pour rejouer s'ils meurent.

-En mode Elite, un joueur d'une équipe est désigné comme attaquant et se bat seul au laser pour capturer le pole qui est défendu par l'équipe adverse.

-En mode Battle, les deux équipent doivent attaquer et défendre un tour chacune, la première à avoir capturé tous les poles adverses gagne.

-En mose Obstacle, le joueur doit terminer un parcours parsemé d'obstacles (NOOOON, SANS BLAGUE ! ) le plus vite possible, c'est un peu un TrackMania sur Shootmania mais sans les voitures.

Il reste encore de nombreux modes comme Infection, Royal ou Combo que je vous laisserai découvrir une fois le jeu acheté.
En conclusion c'est un très bon FPS compétitif (même s'il ny a plus trop de compétitions) sur lequel vous ne gagnerez que grace à votre skill où au skill que n'ont pas les autres. Je vous conseille ce jeu s'il est en soldes car il est un peu vide même si en ce moment, les serveurs se remplissent peu à peu.
19/ 20 car les développeurs n'ont pas su garder leur communauté sur le jeu sur le long terme.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112982794', 'num_games_owned': 333, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 27505, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26099, 'last_played': 1514894470}
review:
Another really competitive game by Nadeo, which sadly died.

I can't describe how much fun I had, when I played it a few years ago.
You could play one of many gamemodes, like Elite (Core gamemode) or just Obstacle (Community created gamemode, where you have a parcour to finish as fast as possible).
Basically what I want to say with this is, that you could play this game the whole day, because there are so many "competitive" gamemodes, but also more "casual" gamemodes, if you need a break.

But the best part of this game is the Map Editor, it's the most simple and easy to use Editor I've ever seen and mostly I made some Obstacle Maps for fun to play it with friends.
You wan't to make your own Map with custom blocks? No problem, there is a Mesh Editor in the game itself and it's easy to use aswell.
So, there are Millions of possibilities and only your imagination can stop yourself from getting good ideas.

Gameplaywise, I like the game too:
- The movement is extremly hard to get used to, and makes other players really hard to shoot
- No Weapon skins, cases, grinding etc.
- 4 interesting weapons
- Gamemodes as said in the introduction
- could probably name more, but I dont have much time right now ;)

All in all worh a buy, but only with friends, since as said, the game is pretty much dead

author: {'steamid': '76561197964949013', 'num_games_owned': 741, 'num_reviews': 331, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1511555172}
review:
사기 전에 주의해야 할 점들:

- ShootMania Storm은 게임이라기보다는 플랫폼에 가까움. 무슨 말이냐면 아레나 스타일의 FPS 게임을 즐길 수도 있지만 다른 유저들이 만든 게임을 게임 내부에서 다운 받아서 (레이싱 게임도 있음) 실행해 볼 수도 있음. 무료/유료 모드들이 있으니 알아서 구입하면 될듯

- 단, 인터페이스가..굉장히 조잡함..영어를 읽을줄 모르면 시작하기도 힘들듯.  온라인에서 다른 사람들이랑 멀티하는데에도 샵에 들어가서 따로 게임을 설치해야함..ㅋㅋ

- 총질 자체는 꽤 재미있음. 퀘이크 식의 아레나 스타일을 좋아한다면 추천

- Bot이랑도 즐길 수 있는데 ShootMania Storm 포럼을 뒤져가며 bot 관련 스크립트를 다운 받고 맵도 다운 받아서 설정을 하나 하나 다 해야함..ㅋㅋ 굉장히 불편함

author: {'steamid': '76561198063051447', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1126, 'last_played': 1559076272}
review:
Excelent jeu que j'ai acheté à sa sortie. Domage qu'il soit très vite mort c'est vraiment dommage. Tout le monde s'est hypé dessus je me souviens à la sortie, ils avaient même organisés des tournois. ISSOU deux mois plus tars COD sort un jeu et les servs sont vides. 

Les graphismes sont vraiment pas mal, le concept de jeu est excelent mais maintenant de nos jours il reste 2-3 allemands dessus mais c'est tout quoi... j'y est joué pandant sa période full et c'étais excelent j'ai beaucoup aimé mais maintenant ça sert plus à rien de le prendre RIP/20

author: {'steamid': '76561197992212029', 'num_games_owned': 400, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 7663, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6138, 'last_played': 1684499075}
review:
20€.. a quand le jeu en free-to-play pour ramener du monde ?

Non parce que le jeu est vraiment vraiment bien mais y'a 3 joueurs.. et un jeu multijoueur avec 3 gars. C'est pas ouf.

Le mode élite c'est incroyable (meilleur mode all-time), le mode obstacle vraiment fun. Faut vraiment une suite à ce jeu au goût du jour. Un jeu hyper exigeant et 100% esport et a regarder ou comprendre c'est ultra simple et beau à voir !

author: {'steamid': '76561198027982768', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 19723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18113, 'last_played': 1662581616}
review:
Очень веселый и мощный киберспортивный шутер с кучей игроков и хардкором... был.
Увы, онлайна все меньше и меньше, играть почти не с кем, а масла в огонь подливает возможность создавать пользовательские режимы (я считаю). Возможно, это тот случай, когда все, что дано для развития комьюнити, его же и убивает.
Нет больше "царя горы" - Royal - он пустой уже три года. Считаю его одним из самых хардкорных режимов, где от тебя требуются внимательность, сообразительность, ловкость и точность, ну и немного удачи.
Далее появился Siege - типичный захват флагов, но зато какой.
Игре очень сильно не хватало пиара, а учитывая то, сколько она стоит теперь, то новых игроков мы не дождемся.

Пациент скорее мертв, чем жив. Очень жаль. Игра была перспективная.
[Тем не менее рекомендую, поскольку я не могу поставить отрицательную оценку такой игре]

author: {'steamid': '76561197967853915', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 14643, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2165, 'last_played': 1581005202}
review:
Un fast fps comme on en fait plus, ShootMania Storm est un jeu qui s'est vidé au fil des années mais qui reste toujours aussi amusant à jouer. Peu de commandes à connaitre (zqsd/flèches clic gauche et clic droit) mais des heures et des heures pour les maitriser.
A l'inverse de la quasi totalité des FPS modernes, les points de vie ne se comptent pas par centaines mais par nombre de touches (habituellement trois). Le but étant donc de toucher sans se faire toucher. On parle là d'un jeu de tir qui se base sur vos talents de mouvements et de visée uniquement. Tout le monde est égal et dispose des mêmes armes dans les mêmes situations.

De nombreux modes différents ainsi qu'un éditeur de niveau offrent un large choix de parties et la possibilité pour les plus créatifs de faire leur propre niveau/mode de jeu.
Un serveur "channels", consistant en une rotation de modes de jeu toutes les heures, a été créé lors de la dernière mise à jour et est accessible gratuitement si vous voulez vous faire une idée sur le jeu avant de l'acheter.

Les défauts les plus évidents sont le manque de joueurs et l'avantage évident selon votre matériel. C'est bête mais si j'étais bon à ce jeu en 2013, depuis mon achat d'un clavier mécanique et d'une souris à capteur optique j'ai gagné un ou deux crans en précision.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006209650', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 10188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3557, 'last_played': 1558883449}
review:
#MakeSMGreatAgainNando

You could describe it as a pararrel game for TrackMania players, as it's part of the ManiaPlanet.
ShootMania is a cool online FPS game, with the ability to build your own maps and play them with your friends and others.

I've played the demo version for like 2 years before I decided to buy the game and I believe it deserves the 20 euros it costs.

There may not be many active players playing the game, but still for a daily gaming at arround night and midnight it's a relaxing experience after the daily activities (well, if you already know how to play this game, else you would want some time to actually feel relaxed :p).

EDIT: After the MP5 update, the game was completely ruined in order for the devs to promote user-made modes through the channels feature. In other words, now almost no one plays SM anymore, because they can't (as most players were playing as demo).

author: {'steamid': '76561197997691407', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1564376981}
review:
You know the most common thing any arena shooter share?  no one seems to want to play these types of games anymore, not matter how the dead genre is sliced.   Shootmania is a simple game but with depth and strategy involved in it.   This game should be up there with CSGO, DOTA2, and other popular e-sport titles, but I think one of the things that really killed this game early was the poor, poor advertising before the game's full release, since this game was made by a french company anyway.

This game shares some aspects from other older arena shooters like unreal, Quake and simplifies itself as a lasertag sport.  there are no weapon pickups, it's just you, your arm blaster that can change it's fire mode by itself depending on what part of the map or zone you are in, your wits and your own skill in movement, which is pretty big here.   Your arm blaster features 2 other weapons than the fireball.  You have the bolt which fuctions just like the railgun from Quake, and there's some kind of wierd mine blaster for indoors use, but becareful not to blow yourself up.

oh yea, and your arm blaster needs to recharge after some shoots so if you try to spray fire balls everywhere, you're looking at a recharge time for each slot while getting shot at yourself.

You have 3 bars of health, sometimes two bars and one bar is taken away from each hit you take.  there are no health pick ups so it's best to stay mobile and not camp.   

seriously, don't camp.

  There are no perks, no demon runes or hack cards like in Halo: Demon slayer brutality Mulitplayer 2016, no loadouts.   This isn't exactly a copy cat of Quake either.  It's a game that kind of does it's own thing and that's great.   It's also a game that can be demanding in the skill department and that's probably another thing that killed this game....which fucking sucks.  the average gamer probably just want a simple line of sight shooter like CSGO for instance and just point and click.

Sure the menu is cluttered somewhat but it's still presentable, alive because of the animations--its actually pretty-- a night sky moving forward as you navigate through the menu.  one of the best things i've seen in a video game to me.


This game looks gorgeous, and it's a shame the player count is at zero all the time, and it's also another goddamn shame that no one wants to play arena games anymore than just the same old contemporary military shooters that are pumped every single year---you can't walk into gamestop nowadays without seeing a poster or some life sized figure of a soldier holding an assault rifle, advertising the next 100th copy of Call of duty that's coming out here in about few months, every single year.

  fucking.   shame.   Worst of all, the market for anything first person shooters is completely overbloated with all these military games, which is why anyone thinks "Oh yea, gotta get Battlefield one!" or "Yo Rob, you got the new CoD yet? I'll be online in a few!".  
The market needs to open up to other kinds of shooters, not just military themed.

This game had huge potential back when the open beta was running few years back.  I got destroyed myself not because the other person had abilities, or weapons had better ranking or stats, it was because he/she knew how to outmanuever other players, had better aim---positive things, okay so you lost, lets get better next time---nope, all that magic is gone nowadays. 

 Now you get killed along with your team mates because some scumbag piece of shit enemy player used a drone strike to bomb the entire map or just simply hiding in a corner while racking up kills left and right which leads to gamers raging and calling people names over the internet, or if you do great in leaderboards you'll get accused of hacking and banned the next minute over the other person doing the actual cheating   << that is what most first person shooters have turned into these days.


People, it's a fun game but with no players around, it's really difficult for me to recommend to anyone, and for that same reason, I can't give my own score for this review.  I ain't wasting my looking for a server with people for almost an hour while looking at the background or fiddling around with the level editor with no one to look at the content I made.

move on somewhere else I guess...

author: {'steamid': '76561198077309087', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1412790167}

author: {'steamid': '76561198132459699', 'num_games_owned': 55, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 94832, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 33845, 'last_played': 1709917613}
review:
¿Estás cansado de tantos FPS que son siempre lo mismo y deseas probar un FPS distinto? Este es juego, un shooter de fantasía futurística en el que todo va a depender de tu habilidad y de solo tu habilidad, este juego no es un pay2win como otros, de aqui si que depende tu verdadera skill.

Hay muchos modos de juego, pero los que más se juegan son: siege (equipo vs equipo), obstacle (superar un mapa en el menor tiempo posible, ¡OJO!, no es tan fácil como parece, primero empieza desde lo más bajo), elite (un atacante debe capturar la pole o matar a los 3 defensores para ganar el punto), battle (equipo contra equipo por la captura de 3 o más poles), infection (es el modo infectado de toda la vida) y muchos más... 

Dadle una oportunidad, os podeis descargar la demo en maniaplanet.com en la que solo podréis acceder a los canales y testearlos, este juego va de poco a más cuando sea vuestra primera vez.

Las cosas malas es que actualmente el pico de jugadores conectados es una cifra baja y nunca será muy conocido, pero yo, que desde el día que salió llevo jugando siempre, me lo conozco todo y es uno de mis FPS favoritos y que nunca otro FPS convencional lo va a superar.

Actualmente solo somos 2 españoles jugando al juego, yo y Astroth, que le dedicamos más horas al modo siege, de otros modos no tengo mucha idea, pero sigue habiendo gente jugando, que es lo que importa.

Lo que más me gusta sin duda es que este juego o trackmania en general no va a requerir de pagos adicionales, ni DLCs ni nada, el juego completo ya lo pagas del tirón, un punto a favor muy grande.

Un saludo y nos vemos en el campo de batalla! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198041218284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1389, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 584, 'last_played': 1502138029}
review:
Even though there should be more people online, this game is very fun to play. The gameplay is quite different from any other shooter due to some unconventional gamemodes. And thanks to the level editor, you will be presented with new terrain for any new round.

Like Trackmania, it's rather easy to pick up, but takes time to master. Note that there are no tutorials in the game. If you're a beginner, it's best to look for one on the web.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070801267', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1021, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 839, 'last_played': 1708334294}
review:
mi pare che nel 2012 ci fu il boom di shootmania.
tutti TUTTI che ci giocavano.
pure i pro di quake. es stermy.
ci furono state tantissime competizioni su questo gioco.
beh fu un successo questo gioco.
sinceramente penso che possa essere competitivo nella sua modilità  che l'ha reso noto,
ovvero quella del 3 contro 1. 
sarebbe stato scontato però che questo gioco passasse dall'avere milioni di player ad averne un centinaio.
non ha avuto vita lunga per la sua monotonia. 
sempre con le stesse due armi
railgun e razzi ( che non si vedono nemmeno, li spara dal polso XD)
sempre stesse mappe (tutte con lo stesso stile)
sempre stesse modalità.

mi spiace veramente tanto per questo gioco.
lo sconsiglio a tutti
ormai è vuoto

author: {'steamid': '76561198029353237', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2657, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2399, 'last_played': 1592329367}
review:
Достаточно атмосферный и динамичный шутер с системой ранговых игр, позволяющий игроку повышать и развивать свой скилл до возможностей, которых ты никогда не мог себе представить в такого рода игр: неограниченные прыжки от стен, зная точную траекторию удара телом; полёт на достаточно дальное расстояние, просчитывание движение оппонентов для точного попадания снарядами по ним, тактические манёвры, а-ля, не можешь вывести из строя вражеского персонажа - возьми скоростью и манёвренностью. Игра очень многогранна и интересна, правда множество опробовавших её сразу опускают руки, мол, СЛОЖНААААА. 

Также в игре часто проводят чемпионаты по киберспортивной дисциплине. Можно встретить самых топовых игроков Европы, из-за низкого кол-ва игроков (в основном французы - их тут просто тьма!).

author: {'steamid': '76561198162545692', 'num_games_owned': 12, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1046, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 974, 'last_played': 1538331905}
review:
Très bon jeu : des graphismes bien réussis, un gameplay entraînant.
Seul défaut, le mode d'édition est incomplet et difficile à prendre en main.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971253097', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3774, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2607, 'last_played': 1578761109}
review:
Cuando vi el primer gameplay del Rocket League le dije a mis amigos: ESTE JUEGO VA A SER LA CAÑA. Hubo quien no me creyó, pero el tiempo le ha colocado en el lugar que le corresponde.

En esta ocasión el contexto es diferente, sobre todo por estas dos razones:
1) El juego que nos ocupa salió hace 3 años.
2) No os hablo tras ver un trailer, sino tras probarlo y ver su alucinante jugabilidad.

TODAVIA NO ME ENTRA EN LA CABEZA cómo es posible que no haya llegado jamás a mis oídos/ojos ni un trailer, ni una noticia, ni un maldito gameplay, o ni tan siquiera una oferta de Steam en épocas de rebajas. ¿Pero dónde leches estaba esta joya escondida? ¿Por qué nadie me ha hablado de él? ¿Por qué giran los planetas? ¿Por qué se mete tan poco cuando tienes niños? ¡¡ALTO!! Que me desvío.

En serio, gente, no exagero. O a lo mejor sí, pero la vena emocional me posee cuando veo una "inyustisia". Es que es exactamente lo que andaba buscando: un FPS competitivo, sencillo de entender pero difícil de dominar, donde ser bueno no se base en usar armas chetadas, sino en simple y llana destreza.

Las partidas son cortas (como en el RL) y emocionantes (como en el RL). Cuesta muy poco empezar desde cero (como en el RL) pero según avanzas da la sensación de que hay una curva de aprendizaje elevada si se quiere llegar a dominar por completo (como en el RL).

JO-DER-JO-DER-JO-DER… ¿todavía no os he convencido?

Pues veréis. Es que además resulta que los límites del Shootmania no se reducen (Activision way of life) a unas determinadas prestaciones dentro del juego y hasta la siguiente versión, sino que esta maravilla cuenta con:

- Un editor de mapas ultra intuitivo, para que crees tus propios y alucinantes mapas en lo que tardas en tirarte un pedo y medio.
- Una herramienta de scripting integrada, para crear tus propios modos de juego. ¡Tenéis que probar el mod de obstáculos, porque es un juego en sí mismo!
- Servidores dedicados. JO-DER SEÑORES. REPITO: SERVIDORES DE-DI-CA-DOS. Pero de los de verdad, no de los de Activision. Para poder jugar con tus colegas lo que te dé la real gana. Además, se pueden montar en Linux, e instalar herramientas de control del servidor que se manejan DESDE DENTRO DEL PROPIO JUEGO. Paro, que eyaculo. ¿He dicho cu-lo? ¡NOOO! ¿Eeeh? Ya. ¡CU-LOOOO!
- Se puede jugar offline en una LAN.
- Sistema de rankings para los modos de juego.
- E-Sport: modo de espectador y repeticiones. Es decir, cuando montas el servidor, se puede montar un servidor encadenado, usado sólo para retransmitir la partida a montones de personas sin que afecte al rendimiento del servidor de juego en el que se juega la partida. ¡¡DIOS MIO DEL AMOR HERMOSO, FOFITO y MILIKITO!!
- Machinimas: potente herramienta para la creación de vídeos. Como los de los trailers.

¿QUE? ¿Seguís fríos? Vamos, si seguís fríos es que no tenéis sangre en las venas.

En serio, no puedo entender cómo no está todo el mundo hablando del Shootmania Storm. Es más, no puedo entender cómo no lleva todo el mundo 3 años hablando del puñetero “Sutmeinia Estorm”. De la misma forma que no entendería que no estuviese todo el mundo hablando del Rocket League actualmente: [Voz de Ylenia de Gandía Shore ON] Juegodeladécada, ¿teteees? [Voz de Ylenia de Gandía Shore OFF].

Y para que no me tildéis de exagerado, y veáis que no es oro todo lo que reluce, os diré los dos grandes puntos en contra:

1) La interfaz del juego es menos intuitiva que si te dan el Guernica como manual para montar una impresora láser. Para que me entendáis, es como abrir Steam dentro de Steam. Es decir, cuando abrís el juego os enfrentáis a una interfaz que está creada para gestionar una comunidad propia y una librería de juegos propia (la de Nadeo). Pensad en el juego como si no lo ejecutaseis dentro de Steam y os resultará más fácil de entender. Por otro lado, las abstracciones que usan en los menús para llegar a jugar al juego y modo de juego que quieres, son bastante confusas.

2) Hay muy poca gente jugándolo online, comparado con los grandes títulos. Aunque en mi caso, sinceramente, ¿para qué necesito a nadie, si ya tengo a mi grupo de colegas que también se lo han pillado y con los que me lo paso teta?

En fin, si habéis leído hasta aquí, y lo negativo no os ha tirado para atrás, ya sabéis, si lo queréis pillar a precio de saldo esperad a las rebajas de turno, o buscad en esas otras tiendas de reputación distraida, pero... POR 2… POR LA VIRGEN… POR LA SANTÍSIMA TRINITY DE MATRIX: ¡¡¡ PILLAROSLO YA O DESAPARECED DE MI VISTA PARA SIEMPRE !!!

P.D.: y si formáis un equipillo de gente maja me avisáis en los comentarios de este análisis y montamos una plataforma competitiva online para jugar en los servidores que he montado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039215638', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 447, 'last_played': 1478886745}
review:
Esto es un juegazo y una pasada en cuanto jugabilidad, acción y diversión. 

-Correr a toda velocidad disparando, capturando puntos y esquivando lluvias de balas.

-Acción a toda máquina y frenética. Consigue una sensación de velocidad y dinamismo que pocos juegos consiguen. 

-Lo peor que se puede decir de este juego es que no hay demasiados servidores ni gente que lo juegue así que si a alguien le apetece pillárselo, a mí me gusta jugar en equipo de forma estratégica.

-Si estás cansado de fórmulas FPS convencionales o poco innovadoras, este juego es aire fresco para el género.

-Es un juego de los que merecen ser jugados, si me piden una definición en 2 palabras seria esta: FUCK YEAH!!

review: I am very disappointed. I played the game in the beta phase and the gameplay itself is of the best amongst all shooters. But at this point the game is unplayable, because there are usually not more than 50 people on the server and in the most competetive  playmode "elite" you only have 3-4 servers with people who are beating up and flaming new players. If you never played the game I would recommend you not to buy it, because there seems to be no support from nadeo anymore and no matchmaking, so unless you spend hours of pointless training you wont have any fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104915678', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3011, 'last_played': 1467125831}
review:
Très bon jeu, très nerveux, avec une approche à la Quake. Si vous n'avez ni de bon mouvements, ni une bonne aim, ne jouez pas à ce jeu.

Malheureusement, je possède ce jeu depuis deux ans maintenant, il ne vaut PLUS LE COUP D'ETRE ACHETE. Je regrette de ne pas avoir passé plus de temps dessus auparavant, car ce jeu est maintenant mort. N'espérez pas trouver de game après 1h du matin, plus personne ne joue à cette heure là. Le problème du ping est permanent, même si j'ai une connexion très stable, j'ai des lagspikes fréquemment, car il n'y a pas assez de serveurs dans ma région. en résumé: très bon, mais la communauté a migré vers d'autres jeux. Dommage.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095980308', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 14673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12096, 'last_played': 1668123371}
review:
Ce jeu est juste excellent, je le recommande à tout amateur de FPS, ce jeu est l'aboutissement du jeu de tir et nous permet,à nous joueurs, de montrer nos réelles qualités de précision et de déplacement, car oui, ce jeu permet de nous déplacer avec un gameplay innovant dans des environnements magnifiques.
La communauté de ce jeu est, elle aussi extraordinaire et très vivante.
Mais, malgré tout, il possède un défaut, trop peu de gens y jouent... en effet la communauté est trop faible ce qui est vraiment dommage... cela rend donc le jeu déséquilibré... mais une fois pris en main complétement, ce jeu laisse libre à la création que ce soit dans le gameplay ou même dans ses propres maps de jeux !
Bref, ce jeu est incroyable et est un excellent jeu d'eSport avec son mode Élite qui est, pour ceux qui le découvriront, le meilleur et aussi le plus spectaculaire.
Merci Nadeo pour ce jeu qui m'a fait passé beaucoup de mes après midi !

author: {'steamid': '76561198070971543', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 10386, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9244, 'last_played': 1577119340}
review: dead game, once it was a really good one, nice gameplay, developers just shi**ed on hit

author: {'steamid': '76561198072907204', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 727, 'last_played': 1709378604}
review:
Shootmania Storm is a really awesome Arena FPS with loads of possibilitys. 

It is a very fast paced game, in wich everything is purely about skill. It is easy to learn, but very hard to master.
There is an editor for near to everything, and the community has already made very good use of them and created loads of new gamemodes, maps and other features. That is one of pros.
Also, there is no 'leveling', no skillpoints, no items, every player is playing under exactly the same conditions (except for hardware of course), what also makes this game perfect for competition, wich is one of the main goals of the game: To be an innovative, competitive, popular new e-sports game.
And there lies the problem, among these words: 'popular'.

One of the only cons that come to my mind, no, actually, THE only is the lacking of popularity the game deserves. The community is awesome, but small. Too small. But instead of giving a negative review because of that, I think this is the best reason to give a positive review: Because then more people might notice how good this game is, and play it, instead of being put off by negative reviews. It may be true, there aren't a lot of servers with people on them, but there are servers, at least enough to still properly play the game.

And finally:  The game is free. Well, not officially, but the demo is free. And the demo lets you play the whole game, with the only tiny exceptions being name customization (with colours and stuff) and custom player skins. So you can technically play the whole game, and at the moment (and for quite a while already) the demo can be played infinetly. No 30-day limit or only certain gamemodes.
But if you should play the demo and enjoy it, I would recommend buying the game to support NADEO and even be able to have awesome names like " ツ 〢 ξ〤ה०ा・". In colour!

I'd give this great game 9/10. Definetly worth playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110212362', 'num_games_owned': 208, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 79709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64345, 'last_played': 1696876655}
review:
Short review, bc i played this game a short time for now:

Fast Paced first person arena shooter. So far. So good.
It´s a really fascinating game, making points with an interesting cartoonlike grafic
(+), a lot of different mods(++), players can create their own mods and maps(++),
and the most important a good fighting system. You can improve a lot even after
thousands of hours playtime.

Easy to learn - hard to master - a key principle for a competitive game.

BUT (-!)
the community is quite small. The only Servers, that are played on recently, are in Europe.
So it´s up to you to fill this small game with life, to improve in it and to improve the game itself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000467619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1488488230}
review: legitimately one of the best games of all time, bafflingly published by a studio with no experience in shooters and no competence in creating a functional multiplayer platform

author: {'steamid': '76561197993834702', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 402, 'last_played': 1459601391}
review:
Positif :
+ prise en mains immédiate
+ tous les outils rêvés pour un modding de qualité
+ du contenu communautaire en pagaille 
+ des modes de jeu alliant déjà-vu et singularité
+ le mod Joust, une vraie réussite
+ gameplay déconcertant au premier abord mais très gratifiant avec de l'entrainement
+ des parties intenses et serrées
+ pas de fioritures

Le cul entre deux chaises : 
+- Une DA quasi-absente : j'apprécie la neutralité totale des décors, mais une prise de risque et un plus grand engagement dans ce domaine aurait été peut-être appréciable.
+- Une communauté faiblarde (en nombre, env. 100-300 joueurs) mais très active : je regrette le manque de joueurs mais j'apprécie le groupuscule bien actif créant une certaine émulsion. En terme de niveau, il y a de tout, tout comme en terme de mentalité. Un conseil, évitez de regarder le chat in-game vous allez vous faire du mal. 

Négatif :
- interface Maniaplanet qui en révulsera plus d'un
- musiques

En définitif, je pense vraiment qu'il s'agit d'un véritable must-have pour les amateurs de fast-fps. Pour les autres, je vous conseille de passer bien évidemment par la démo gratuite qui permet de se faire assez rapidement une idée du titre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022143876', 'num_games_owned': 2634, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 480, 'last_played': 1588333202}
review: Criminally underrated FPS with a super high skill ceiling. The player base is small, but I have been able to get games going most of the time without issue.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111533384', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 18369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1541, 'last_played': 1698274705}
review:
Wer bock auf eine schnelle Runde Action hat wird hier auf seine Kosten kommen. Die Physik der Schüsse und das movement-System samt Walljumps sorgen für eine Menge möglichkeiten. Die Grafik fetzt einen nicht weg sieht aber echt schnike aus. Und das System das man alles anpassen kann, von Mapeditor bis eigene Spielermodels und selbstprogrammierbare Spielmodi klappt super, nur erstmal herauszufinden wie man an die anderen Editoren außer dem Map- und Replayeditor rankommt, ist etwas friemelig.

Ich wünsche mir nur, das etwas mehr Leute die awesomness dieses Spiels erkennen...

Ansonsten Chapeu Nadeo, wer nen schnellen Shooter mit ner Menge Skill ohne Pay2Win sucht, viel Spaß

MFG Jannled

author: {'steamid': '76561197998914313', 'num_games_owned': 968, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1457057764}
review:
I played this game when it first released, lost my mania planet account & game because my original email was hacked, and the maniaplanet website is terrible when trying to fix that issue. Hint to those who have that problem... You cannot fix it.

Anyway, I cannot recommend this game right now. At all. There is no player base. Its dead. It's a great twitch based FPS with tons of potential. The only ManiaPlanet games that have a very large player base are the TrackMania games. ShootMania however, is empty.

If you want a twitch based FPS instead of the recurring duck & cover FPS that is so standard today, try Quake Live.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023356837', 'num_games_owned': 443, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 24374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18853, 'last_played': 1689477015}
review:
Simple. Fast-paced. All you need is skill.

There's not a single shootergame that I like more than this.
No unlocks, no experience, every player has the same weapons, rookie or veteran.
Only your skill decides who lives and who dies.

HOWEVER, do NOT play this on Steam.
Download the seperate launcher from their official site.
I went from 30-40 fps to 150-200 by doing just that.

See you ingame! ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198048384767', 'num_games_owned': 423, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 78520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18799, 'last_played': 1707059855}
review:
Update 2: I want to strongly enforce my opinion, that if you are looking into buying this game, the main reason should be Obstacle. While you can play other modes with friends or from time to time with strangers, obstacle is always playable and has a great variety. There are servers for tutorials, puzzle maps, different difficulties, dumb maps, progressive maps and coop maps. I started playing to play this game again around February, and played several hundred hours in quarantine, most of it in Obstacle. See this as the Trackmania of the Ego-Shooter world.

Update: Around 400 people play this game every day, and finding a game is generally not a problem, at least in the evening and if you join the recommended game mode of the hour. Also, Obstacle is probably the best (singleplayer) movement based ego shooter gamemode of all time and the game is worth getting just for that mode (the learning curve is steep though).

+Easy to learn, hard to master.
+Modes are fun and I feel that some of them are unique to Shootmania.
 >+You can also programm your own modes with Maniascript.
 >>+People programmed modes you can play alone like Obstacle, Survival etc. 
+Integrated map and replay editor.
+You can customize your crosshair, player model etc.

-Low player base, those who still play should easily outplay you if you are new.
-You can only choose your crosshair and player model in game. Importing it so you can choose it is something you have to figure out yourself. 
-UI generally is not very intuitive.

-->The gameplay and possibilities are great, thats why I give a positive review. But the low playerbase is a huge drawback for new people. Try the free demo, it lets you play the game almost unlimited. In case you like the game after trying it, consider buying it to show it some love.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051500995', 'num_games_owned': 967, 'num_reviews': 216, 'playtime_forever': 701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 537, 'last_played': 1520424620}
review:
Nadeo nun oyunlarını az çok biliyorsunuzdur. Gelişi güzel oyunları abartıp uçurtan bir tarzı var kendilerinin. Tracmania gibi efsanevi uçuk yarış oyunlarından sonra bir Nadeo FPS oyunu nasıl olur sizce? FPS dede apayrı ve farklı bir türe imza atan firma bu oyununuda efsane yapmış gerçekten. Oyun grafik ve seslerine denilebilecek birşey zaten yok. Oynanış olarakda şartları zorlamışlar ve hardcore bir oyun yapmışlar diyebilirim.Bir oyunu bukadar kolay oynanışa sahipden bukadar zor nasıl yapabilirler ya? ^^ Tamamen playerlığa bakan bir yapıya sahip oyun. Hatta bana Gunz havası verdi hafifde olsa uçuşlar kaçışlar koşturmacalar ve ateşler... İşin asıl zor kısmıysa o mermileri tutturmak... Oyunun videosunu izlediğinizde daha rahat anlayacaksınız bu yüzden daha fazla uzatmadan oyun için hazırladığım rehber tadında bir video ile baş başa bırakıyorum sizleri. Playerlık oyunları seviyorsanız kesinlikle denemelisiniz. İyi Seyirler ^^
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LypQ3waB2Yg

author: {'steamid': '76561197989243222', 'num_games_owned': 2197, 'num_reviews': 299, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1530958820}
review:
A játék két hatalmas hibába esett:

1 - Minimális befeketetés mellett akart kidobni a piacra egy fps-t a Nadeo. A koncepció az volt, hogy elkezdik fejleszteni a játékot, majd idővel betársul a közösség, készítik a mapokat meg a gamemodeokat, egyéb kontentet. A valóság nem is lehetne messzebb a francia csapat ostoba elméletétől. A játékban az első két évben körülbelül az alap módot jászották a népek, majd nagy nehezen rakott bele valaki egy instát is, ami relatíve egész élvezhető is. A játék miután teljesen meghalt az amerikai piacon, és kezdett haldokolni eu szinten is, kapott egy defrag szerű szaladgálós módot, ami megmondom egészen jó lett. Ekkor azonban már késő volt.

Ennyi idő leforgása után is olyan érzete van az embernek, hogy egy nagyon suta ingyenes modot játszik ami a Trackmaniahoz készült. A menüben még mindig bent van például a kocsi kürt opció. Apropó opciók: a menürendszer valami borzalom volt a kezdeti időkben, ma már nagyjából megkapta a kalsszikus fps rendszert, de elég sok víz lefolyt a Dunán míg észhez kaptak.

2 - A második súlyos hiba volt a fejlesztési pénz nagy hányadának az esportba feccölése. A játék még ki sem jött az alpha fázisból, már elkezdték szervezni a francia lanokat agyba főbe. Sok profi játékost lefizettek, hogy reklámozzák a játékot, legyen az unrealos, wowos vagy cs-s esetleg quakes. Anno emlékszem, hogy akkor az eu top3ban végző Strenx (ex profi quakes) egyszerűen feladta a játékot, mert minden héten átformálta a fejlesztőcsapat az egész mozgásrendszert.

Ehhez hozzátartozik, hogy a gamemode még mindig ez a suta "egy ember támad railel, 3 rakétával véd" baromság volt. Szinte semmi köze a csapatjátékhoz, előbb utóbb csak kitapasztalták a spammelési techinkákat. A történet vége, hogy a játék esport mivolta egyszerűen bedöglött egy éven belül pénz hiány miatt (meglepő módon). A nagyobb unreal és quakes játékosok elvitték magukkal a nyereményeket, és a francia csapat ott maradt egy félig döglött játékosbázissal.
A játék egyik gamemodeja ingyenes lett a sok kínlódást követően, és ilyen Trackmania-s jellegű időlimites f2p módszert kapott...de már ez sem segített rajta.

Megemlíteném, hogy a Shootmania mozgása nem rossz, de új játékosok számára olyan, mintha jégen szaladgálna egy mamuszban. Emellé hozzátársul, hogy minden oldalazás után beleng a kép kicsit, és ilyen lean szerű képernyő effekt van, ami szintén nem segít a stabil kép érzetéhez.

Fun lehet ha havarokkal felmentek instázni, vagy obsticle-özni egymagadba, de semmi egyénisége nincs a játéknak, és háromféle textúra van benne, szóval új játékosoknak abszolút nem vonzó. Ennél fényévekkel színvonalasabb az UT4, Ql , Warsow...és mind ingyenes. Végső értékelés: 3/10 francia gombaleves, amit szintén nem szeretek.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992635697', 'num_games_owned': 177, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 58475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36454, 'last_played': 1694912227}
review: Die Bewertung lässt sich in einem Wort zusammenfassen: Fantastisch. Von mir seit über einem Jahr fast täglich gespielt und es macht immer noch Spaß. Der Einstieg ist leicht doch das Spielkonzept beweist Tiefe und man braucht einiges an Training um hier zu den besten zu gehören. Verschiedene Spielmodi sorgen für Abwechslung ob mehr taktisch geprägtes Spiel im Elite-Modus oder Arcade-Ballerei in Royal, hier dürfte für jeden etwas dabei sein. Ein kleiner Wermutstropfen ist jedoch, dass nicht mehr so viele Spieler aktiv sind. Außerdem gehört hier auch immer zum Spiel das Gefluche über die Hitbox. Trotzdem gilt - Leute spielt mehr Shootmania!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198208410359', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1549053895}
review:
Désert, est le mot qui qualifie le mieux ce jeu, je l'ai acheté en pensant faire de superbes parties contre des joueurs du monde entier...au final je me retrouve tout seul a vagabonder dans un serveur vide.


Je n'ai peut-être pas fait comme il faut néanmoins je ne joue presque pas (pour ne pas dire jamais) a ce jeu.

Si je ne m'y prend pas bien veuiller m'excuser par avance et ce serait avec joie que j'aimerai que vous m'expliquiez.

Car c'est un jeu avec un très grand potentiel (que je ne sais pas utiliser apparemment) et dont j'aimerai passer mes journées entières dessus.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987881545', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1446606305}
review:
after some time I decided to check out this game again. It is a clean good shooter. the movement is simple but effective and so is the shooting.

The smal community is very supportive and helped me out a lot. Trying to figure out all the game modes was a new fun and fresh experience. 

Anyone with experience will enjoy this game, anyone without experience will have fun if they are willing to spend some time improving. Some game mode are very unforgiving and small mistakes can lead to you just sitting around for some time. There is a ranking system to team you up agains players of similar skill level so its not a total train wreak. But Shootmania Storm is an old school shooter, so the player with superior aim will most likely always win.

review:
Kedysi táto hra vyzerala nadejne. Mohli sme tu mať nástupcu podobného hry "Half-Life 2 Deathmatch" ktorý by sa hral pofesionálne. Hra sa hrávala, je super dnes a kedysi bola tiež. No dnes sú servery prázdne. Dnes túto hru nedoporučujem z dôvodu nedostatku hráčov na všetkých módoch. Inak by som túto hru doporučil všetkým čo majú radi postrehové fps, respektívne vyskúšať úplne všetkým pretože tá hra stála fakt za to. Kedže to je od mania planet a ubi, nečudujem sa že hra upadá. 95/100

author: {'steamid': '76561198067762973', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1439995398}
review: ShootMania Storm- это соревнование могучих рейнджеров. С помощью простейшего управления клавиш w,a,s,d и мыши ваш персонаж может отталкиваться от поверхности, скользить по ней, выпускать трос для преодоления больших дистанций. Динамичный игровой процесс не обременен набором ненужного оружия и разнообразен количеством карт. Только находясь в постоянном движении, можно быть какое-то время в безопасности. Победа полностью зависит от игрового навыка и спортивной ловкости. Играя, не забывайте, что спорт - это движение, движение - это жизнь!

author: {'steamid': '76561198059817633', 'num_games_owned': 447, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 22102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20403, 'last_played': 1495986733}
review:
( Je précise que j'y joue depuis la première bêta )

Shootmania est un des seuls FPS sorti ces 5 dernières années proposant une gameplay si particulier et orienté à 100% compétition et plaisir de jeu.

Shootmania n'a pas suivi les FPS génériques qui pullulent, il garde son propre style et il vise l'essentiel du FPS. Pas de choix d'armes, pas d'atouts ou autres idioties permettant d'être plus fort. Pour être bon sur shootmania il faudra maitriser tous les mouvements et développer des capacités inutilisés dans les FPS génériques de cette génération comme l'anticipation des mouvements des adversaires d'une manière très avancée ou avoir une précision parfaite ( on peut pas vider son chargeur en full nobrain sur shootmania ).

Niveau technique Shootmania est parfait. L'amateur de FPS compétitifs et rapides se posera la question du netcode, de la qualité du réseau et de la restitution des mouvements. Sachez alors que la qualité de réseau est devenue la meilleure selon moi, au début c'était pas trop ça mai Nadeo à amélioré le netcode jusqu'à avoir quelque chose de parfait !

Ensuite viens la commu, maintenant que shootmania est relié au workshop de Steam ( Steam non obligatoire pour une fois ) on voit tout de suite les capacités de l'éditeur de maps ainsi que la puissance d'un jeu communautaire. On crée les maps qu'on veut ( tout cela gratuitement biensur, TMTC Activision x) ).
Les adeptes des mods et de la personnalisation trouveront leur bonheur, en effet on peut crée nos propres skins, nos propres taunts etc... et ceci sans limite, on se contente pas d'un simple éditeur de peinture, on peut importer nos objets 3D. Puis également crée nos propres mods de jeux !

Nadeo soutient très bien son jeu malgrès que c'est un studio beaucoup plus petit que DICE ou autre, on est à l'écoute sur leur forum, par les développeurs et pas par des community managers payés à faire semblant qu'ils s'intéressent à leur commu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114908591', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 59284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 10, 'playtime_at_review': 5192, 'last_played': 1710190364}

author: {'steamid': '76561198073433353', 'num_games_owned': 276, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 489, 'last_played': 1436729331}
review:
An easy to learn, hard to master game. Only one weapon mounted on your wrist. A couple other weapons that activate once you reach a certain spot, like mounted weapons.

Jumping gets you killed as it's too hard to maneuver in mid-air. To win in this game, move fast, shoot smart and actually capture the damn poles when it's your turn to attack.

One big downside is it's hard to get players online. If you have friends, this is a PERFECT game for a LAN party, or even online. Most servers are filled with skilled players. Not pros, but skilled players.

If you have friends, this game is a definite buy. Sculpt a weenie into one of your levels and invite your friends to play with you. They'll surely laugh, unless they have a bad sense of humour.

Summary: Great game, not many players, amazing with friends, weiners everywhere.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014183045', 'num_games_owned': 585, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1761, 'last_played': 1584241338}
review:
Malgrès son échec commercialement parlant, ShootMania est un jeu compétitif très bon et très évolué.
Offrant un nouveau mode de jeu différent de la plupart des FPS, le mode Elite se départage des autres grace à son modèle 3 vs 1.
En essayant d'être un Fast FPS, ShootMania à voulu révolutionner le genre. Les mouvements sont vraiment fluide et très prenants, la vitesse fait vraiment penser à un bon vieux Quake à l'ancienne !
Le jeu plaira surement aux personnes aimant la difficulté ainsi que le genre du Fast FPS, certes il n'est pas fait pour tout le monde, mais vous pourrez très bien prendre un grand plaisir en y jouant !

review:
This is an excellent game for those who are thirsty for some new challenge! It´s not just shooting you have to learn, its also jumping and usage of your "boost". You just can't master them all at once, but once you master you can even challenge the top players of the game. 
I recommend this for any European player who likes to parkour, shoot people from mid air, trying to be Tarzan or who likes lasers and rockets!

author: {'steamid': '76561198045890663', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 312529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1571, 'playtime_at_review': 41325, 'last_played': 1710798481}
review:
Ein sehr spaßiger und skillbasierter First Person Shooter.
Sehr minimalistisch gehalten, dennoch kann man sich immer weiter verbessern was movement und aim angeht. 
Man muss anfangs auch einiges an Zeit hereinstecken da das Spiel einem nicht viel beibringt.
Vor allem das Movement ist herausfordernd und bietet sehr viele Möglichkeiten.
Dank des Mapeditors gibt es ständig neue Maps.

Ist auch sehr gut für E-sport geeignet. 
Die Community ist leider relativ klein, aber dennoch gut organisiert.
Es gibt viele verschiedene Modi die teilweise von der Community erstellt wurden.

Es lohnt sich den Shooter auszuprobieren ist erfrischend bei dem heutigen Einheitsbrei

author: {'steamid': '76561198036570644', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 10940, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9841, 'last_played': 1585512652}
review:
На что похожа эта игра? Сразу хочется сравнить её с Quake, но в деталях всё совсем по другому.
Управление предельно простое, игрок не использует ничего, кроме w,a,s,d и клавиш мыши.
Оружие здесь - это инструмент к дейстию (насчитал всего 4 вида). У каждого вида оружия своя уникальная ценность: скорострельность, зона поражения, дальность и скорость достижения цели. Никакого мусора из многообразия бесполезных пушек и прочего недоразумения, которое лишь отвлекает от соревновательного процесса.
Что особенно потрясает в этой игре - это передвижение. Любая поверхность - это зона контакта, в зависимости от её характера, от неё можно оттолкнуться, скользить по ней, можно выпустить хрень из руки, на которой ты будешь взмывать над картой как спайдермен!
Очень много карт, на картах реализуют все эти возможности контактных поверхностей и это делает игру вдвойне захватывающей.
Из всего этого процесс игры представляет очень динамичным и без всего лишнего. Для киберспорта - это самое то, для любителей просто погонять вечером советую режим siege.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033280875', 'num_games_owned': 637, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 5950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5063, 'last_played': 1437764866}
review:
Eine klare Alternative zu Formaten wie "Call of Duty" oder "Battlefield"! Anstatt eine Ungleichheit durch Klassen und Killstreaks zu schaffen wird hier auf die alten Shooter-Tugenden zurückgegriffen: Jeder hat die selben Bedingungen und diese Verändern sich in keinem Moment des Spiels. Allerdings braucht es sehr gutes Aiming, viel Übung um sich in das Moveset einzufinden mit Walljumps und dergleichen. Es gibt viele verschieden Spielmodi (wobei manche leider ausgestorben sind) und auch der Leveleditor taugt wie zu erwarten sehr!
Einziges Manko ist der Mangel an aktiven Spielern, also wenn es mal günstig zu haben ist, ist es einen Versuch wert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052311675', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 899, 'last_played': 1478542816}
review:
I find this game a natural successor to Quake or Unreal Tournament. Its approach is very simple: one weapon, 2 health points, large maps, speed and different runner mechanics (grappling hooks, jump pads, wall jumping). Gamemodes go from deathmatch to battle (dominion/conquest) or obstacles courses. Really simple, easy to understand and difficult to master as any old school game. But specially really really fun and addictive.

The problem I see is, while this game has a good amount of players (at least in Europe. It can be hard to find people from other regions) it is not as popular as it deserves or as it tries to be.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151222054', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 3062, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 429, 'last_played': 1568135462}
review:
This game is excactly the thing i always wanted to play.(over 200h already played, just yesterday added to steam)
Back to the roots. No endless weapon buying you just rely on your skill and teamwork. The different game modes that are availible have everything you need. From big Teamplays to small Team fights, to Survial fights on your own. This game is the real deal when you wanna talk about compedetive gaming. 
Of course you have you choice of weapon, but it really comes down to you and your skill. 
I played a loot of Counterstrike, but never made the jump to the newer Versions after 1.6 . Because it got just to fancy for my taste. 
Back to the roots of FPS Arena Gaming. Shootmania is a Game that lets me have no need for another FPS Game out there.

But the best thing as always the Community and the endless output of new Maps. Plus the unique Gameplay make this Game to one of my favourites. 

Dont just read there and buy this Game.
